headline.main: HOOVER CONDEMNS COURSE ON HELSINKI; Former President Opposes Any Step by U.S. to Force End of War on Soviets

lead_paragraph: Herbert Hoover expressed strong opposition yesterday to the use of pressure on Finland by the United States Government to stop the Russo-Finnish war. The former President asked: "Has America lost all sense of human and moral proportions?"
abstract: Scores U S efforts to end Finnish-USSR war
snippet: Herbert Hoover expressed strong opposition yesterday to the use of pressure on Finland by the United States Government to stop the Russo-Finnish war. The former President asked: "Has America lost all sense of human and moral proportions?"...
